message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
public String reverseWords(String str) {
    List<String> words = Arrays.asList(str.split(" "));
    Collections.reverse(words);
    Iterator<String> it = words.iterator();
    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
    while(it.hasNext()){
        sb.append(it.next());
        if(it.hasNext()){
            sb.append(" ");
        }
    }
    return sb.toString();
}
<<<explanation>>>: This function splits the input string into a list of words, then reverses the list. It then uses an iterator to append each word in the reversed list to a StringBuilder, adding a space after each word except the last. The function finally returns the reversed string.
